required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Pre-Approval Access to Rilpivirine Long Acting (RPV LA) Injectable Suspension for the Treatment of a Participant With Human Immunodeficiency Virus (HIV)-1 Infection
clinical_study.official_title: Rilpivirine Long Acting Single Patient Requests

brief_summary.textblock: The main purpose of this pre-approval access program (PAAP) is to provide rilpivirine Long Acting (RPV LA) injectable suspension for the treatment of human immunodeficiency virus (HIV)-1 infection as single patient request to individuals who have no available treatment alternatives and/or limited treatment options (for example, who are unable to participate in the Phase III clinical studies or do not qualify). RPV LA can only be provided if participants are also eligible for cabotegravir Long Acting injections.

intervention.description: Participants will receive RPV LA injectable suspension containing 300 milligram per milliliter (mg/mL) of RPV by intramuscular (IM) injection. A starting dose of 900 milligram (mg) RPV LA (3 milliliter [mL] suspension) will be administered with subsequent doses of 600 mg RPV given at 4-week intervals.

overall_official.last_name: Janssen Sciences Ireland UC Clinical Trial
